Author: nottsarah
Text: thank you, this made me feel a lil better <3

Author: bubblewrapmcthousand
Text: as time passes you will feel better. ive been there, at one point i was eating 4,000-6,000 everyday for WEEKS. honestly just try to start fresh and you will be back to normal in no time. stay hydrated, maybe move around a bit. and try to forgive yourself, binging is a natural reaction to being in a caloric deficit for a while.
